definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
fortune telling based on the subject's face
to divine using the trigrams/fortune telling
grand scribe (official position in many Chinese states up to the Han)
feng shui master/geomancer/stock figure in folk tales, as a wise adviser or a charlatan
Zi Wei Dou Shu, a form of Chinese fortune-telling
